title: Lesson 4 — Travel & Transportation
description: Essential phrases for using public transport, asking directions, and travel planning

lines.speaker: A
lines.english: When does the bus to Bangalore come?

lines.speaker: A
lines.english: Excuse me, where is the railway station?
lines.hindi: क्षमा कीजिए, रेलवे स्टेशन कहाँ है?

lines.speaker: B
lines.kannada: Eduru signal nalli left turn tegedu, straight hogi
lines.english: Take left at the next signal and go straight
lines.hindi: अगले सिग्नल पर बाएं मुड़कर सीधे जाइए
lines.bengali: পরের সিগন্যালে বাঁ দিকে ঘুরে সোজা যান

lines.speaker: B
lines.kannada: Adi metro station da pakkadalli ide
lines.hindi: वह मेट्रो स्टेशन के पास है

lines.speaker: A
lines.english: When will the Chennai Express arrive?

lines.speaker: B
lines.kannada: Train late aagide, inna ardha ganta aagutte
lines.english: The train is late by half an hour

lines.speaker: A
lines.kannada: Ee platform alli yenu train barutte?
lines.english: Which train comes on this platform?
lines.hindi: इस प्लेटफॉर्म पर कौन सी ट्रेन आती है?
